organization.name: land-registry
organization.title: HM Land Registry
organization.description:
HM Land Registry (HMLR) registers the ownership of land and property in England and Wales. It keeps and maintains the Land Register, where more than 29 million titles (the evidence of ownership) are documented.

HM Land Registry is an executive agency of the Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy.

https://www.gov.uk/land-registry

object_error_summary.message: gemini2/gemini2-1.3 will be deprecated, please use gemin2-3

Error Message: "Use constraints shall be provided."
